pkgmetadata.longdescription: # LANK## Listening Anchor Nodes for KIn service of:- **L**abels- **A**ddresses (peer discovery)- **N**ames- **K**eys## InstallationLANK is easy to install using pip:```pip install lank```## UsageOnce installed, simply run the `lank` command from any terminal.## AuthorCreated by Shawn A. Wilson [lannocc@yahoo.com] aka LANNOCC.
